ModMetaData.name: Light Map
ModMetaData.author: Syrus
ModMetaData.description:
Adds an overlay which shows the brightness of tiles on the map.
Can be toggled to only show the overlay for roofed areas.
Dark areas are colored black and red. Lit areas are color in shades of green if at 50% or above and yellow if below 50%. Brightly lit areas show up white.
